name: Six Shooter (TrashCanPete, Fletcher Poole, NZSol, Malcjo)
name_original: Six Shooter (TrashCanPete, Fletcher Poole, NZSol, Malcjo)
description:
We are a team of four, second-year Game Design students at Yoobee School of Design, Wellington (NZ). Six Shooter was made in Unity in 5 weeks. We were inspired by action FPS games like F.E.A.R, Antarctica 88, and Dead Space and wanted to create a slower paced, narrative-driven shooter where players had to use their gun to defeat enemies and solve puzzles. Our main goal for this project was to collect player analytics data and make improvements based on player behaviour and feedback. 

This was a huge learning experience for all of us and we welcome any and all constructive feedback. Thanks for playing!

Note:  All characters and places appearing in this work are fictitious. Any resemblance to real persons, living or dead, is purely coincidental.
